title: What's behind Russia cutting off natural gas to Bulgaria and Poland?
content:
1. What's behind Russia cutting off natural gas to Bulgaria and Poland?  CBS News
  2. Russia halts gas exports to Poland and Bulgaria amid war in Ukraine – BBC News  BBC News
  3. EU accuses Russia of 'blackmail' after it cuts gas to Poland, Bulgaria  Fox News
  4. What is the EU's stance on Russia's roubles gas payment demand?  Reuters.com
  5. Editorial: Russia is doing the west's work in cutting gas to Bulgaria and Poland  The Independent
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
